Diagnosis oral SCC ED base histological examination hematoxylin eosin-stained tissue section . All patient receive total surgical excision lesion Department Oral Maxillofacial Surgery Department Otolaryngology , National Taiwan University Hospital period 1997 2004 . Specimens obtain either incisional biopsy total surgical excision lesion . If lymph node diagnose positive SCC , neck dissection postoperative radiation therapy also include treatment protocol . No patient receive cancer therapy initial biopsy . Details patient ’ oral habit , include daily consumption AQs , cigarettes , alcohol well duration habit , also record medical chart . SAS cell grow cover slide fixed 3.7 % paraformaldehyde 15 min permeabilized 0.2 % Triton X-100 PBS ( 0.58M Na2HPO4 , 0.17 M Na H2PO4 , 0.68 M NaCl , pH=7.4 ) ( PBST ) 5 min . Cell fractionation SAS cell seed 10cm dish 2x 106 cells/dish culture DMEM 18–24 h. The cell starve 24 h serum-free medium . After treatment HGF give time , cell harvest washed ice-cold PBS . The cell resuspend 100 lL lysis buffer ( 10 mM Hepes , 10 mM NaCl , 0.1 mM EDTA , 0.1 mM EGTA , 1 % NP-40 , 0.5 mM phenylmethylsulfonyl uoride , 0.1 mM dithiothreitol , 0.1 mM sodium orthovanadate , protease inhibitor ) incubate ice 10 min .
